author: OzAmram
body:
#### PR description:

This is a small PR to fix the issue that 0T data cannot be reco'ed currently due to the fact that 0T 2D templates do not exist.
This is currently causing an issue for Tier 0 replays: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tier0-Ops/2129/1/1/1/1.html

 Creating 2D 0T templates would take a significant amount of effort and there doesn't seem to be much reason to run the 2D reco for 0T data, so we think the simplest solution is to just not turn on CR if we are running at 0T. This fix tries to check if the 0T override has been set and only turns on CR if it has not. Their may be a cleaner way to do this, so we are open to suggestions. 


We expect this PR to produce no changes except for 0T data. 
#### PR validation:

I have tested that several runTheMatrix workflows still run as expected and now 0T data works as well.
title: Turn off Cluster Repair for 0T data
